channel.title: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "SNAKEMAN's Cantina" - Hidden deep within the Country of Sandwiches...

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
Cana blinked when Novaix's gaze turned away and he broke eye contact

"huh!?"

She yawns and actually sees Novaix looking out the window

"Oh you musta been the person that way having all the fun"

She said to one one in particular and proceeded to ask the barperson for a vodka

"actually make it a double please"

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: Novaix's eyes quickly reverted to normal, and his gaze turned to the window so fast, you'd barely think he was looking at you in the first place…

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
The Barperson give Cana her Hatake Howler and she raises a hand to grab it, not bothering to raise her head
she drags the drink over and pushers her self up eventually managing to drink the howler ……….

"AAAWWOOOOO…….WOAH That woke me up!!"

She looked at the now empty glass and suddenly snapped her head round finally noticing the familar stench of blood spying the bodies she questioned

"hnnn Did I do that?……I dont remember and I usually do concidering I like fighting..Last i remember was fighting Zombjas ….nope this was not my fault this time pity I missed all the fun ..huh?"

She turned aound feeling someone stare at her and met Novaix's gase …….

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: Novaix tilts his head towards the newcomer, and his eyes glitter an electric blue…

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
Cana yawns as she approaches

Man its been ages since Ive been here I need a howler after dealing with those zombjas

She doesn't even notice the burst of lighting and the flowing chakra, she opens the door and procees to walk on autopliot over all of the bodies, not even registering the thick smell of blood,to the bar. Proceeds to pick up a reletively undamaged stool and plonks down on it

"OI bar keep 1 Hatake Howler ove her plz nad make it snappy"

With that statement her head hits the bar and she lets out an almighty sigh

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
The air in the bar seems unusually thick compared to normal.
A burst of blinding white light shakes the building, and Novaix lies crouched in the middle of the bar.
He looks side to side, then leans in a corner, eyeing the room.

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: A Jonin with yellow hair jumps from tree to tree trying to find SNAKEMAN.

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: A wandering Chunin, seemingly lost, wandered right into the proximity of the cantina. Well, into the wall, more likely. Peeling himself from the brick, he wandered into the actual entrance with a cheesy monster mask on his face. "When did this bar get here?", he wondered aloud as he sat at the bar itself, watching the commotion unfold before him.

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: A light haired jonin entered the town, his black cloak mixing himself in with the darkness fluttered in the breeze. Eyes sharp from his life of battling to survive caught sight of a newspaper article floating in the wind near him. Reaching out, he flicked a chakra string towards it and pulled it to him. SNAKEMAN was all he needed to read before deciding to go the cantina. Reaching behind him, he placed the newspaper article in a pocket next to a scroll that held all of his puppets. "Should probably get a move on if I want to get anything to drink." Pulling his hood over his head, he started towards the direction of the cantina.

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
As RazyVan walks in and sees he is met with peering eyes,all looking at his scratch-less headband,one in particular arises.He stands up,squints his eyes and laughs.

the man in the fedora only looks over his shoulder peering at the newcomer!

"So,who the hell do you think you are???!"
"Me"?
The newcomer looks up at the peeing eyes,as everyone is startled to see his strange yellow eyes,inhabited only by a strange black mark
"Who else do you think I'd be talking to,dumbass?"-Shouted the man,over-flowing with anxiety and will to fight!
the newcomer simply took a letter out,looked at it,raised his head and answered-"Do you know what this is?"
"huh?why would I,it won't make a difference!!hahahah!"
"It is the green light of face-beating!"-and the man turned thte letter so it was read-able by all in front of him.It simply said,"Beat Face",and was accompanied by a signature.
"what do you think you are going to do with that,huh?"

The man in the fedora looked at it,his eyes growing large with astonishment."A NWW higher officer?"

The newcomer rolled it back into his sleeve,looked at the man in front of him and opened his palm's,thrusting them forwards with his fingers sticking out,then,suddenly two puppets came up through the floor in an instant,both sending their poisoned arms through his chest in an instant.As he withdrew them,he looked up,and as he gripped his sword and drew it out one centimeter,he shouted-"Awaken,Zangetsu"1 and the sword burst into some kind of Lightning chakra,everyone was on the ground.Everyone in the bar was dead,except for one,the man in the fedora,who looked up staring at the floor,then at the sword which was now completely changed.It was like a long pole,on each end it went off into a sort of Z-shaped blade,which went into opposite directions on each end.One faced down,and one up.Lightning,real lightning was streaming through it and the strange energy flowing out.

Footnotes
1. name is the same but the effects are completely different

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: The man in the fedora looks up from his kbar, sees some guy walk in with the chakra seeming to pour off of him, and snorts, going back to his knife. "Guy's gonna get himself killed walking into a bar that's known for serving missing-nin lit up like a freaking raiton jutsu with chakra," he mutters to himself.

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: As a young ninja with a strange coat with an insignia in it noting something about reapers who seems to be under the effects of some kind of sickness walks up to the cantina,he notices the strange amount of chakra flowing from it and decides to check it out.As he moves with greatness under his coat he looks up into the night moon,his headband gleaming with the sign of Hinamizawa on it under the moonlight,and as he entered the cantina is shined under the lamp-light,dozens of heads peered over their shoulders to see what happened,all of them missing-nin!

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: *A figure folds the paper up and sticks it into his trenchcoat, taking the time to adjust the battered fedora atop his head before striding in, the hitaie-ai plate attached to the hem of the coat flashing a little; displaying the insignia of the Demolition Village* Hmm, place don't look like much. *He signals to the barkeep* Gimme a Caribou Lou if ya got it. *Settling himself at the bar, he takes out a kbar knife and a whet stone, and sets to work on the blade*

item.title: noone knows
item.content:encoded:
walks in the cantina were im i …….who im i but theres one thing i know i m darkness
i m the master

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: A ninja with black hair and black cloth and leather outfit with a gold trim and cape walks in and says hello miro how are you doing i have started my own village now.

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
…It burns….

BBB felt tears spring to his eyes the moment the Hatake Howler touched his tongue. He couldn't spit and he couldn't swallow. It was as if the toxic mix had rendered him incapable of doing anything other than feel the painful stinging. ….Must swallow… he told himself. …Must make pain go away…

By the time he had mustered up the strength to force the noxious drink down his throat, the girl Cana had already gone and had been replaced by a strange man who was giving the bartender the stink-eye. When the bartender finished serving the other nin, BBB raised his hand politely, getting ready to order another drink.

"Whassamatter? You ain't finished yer drink, yet," the bartender commented. "Dontcha like it?"

Intimidated by the burlier man, BBB immediately shook his head. "It's a perfectly good drink, sir," he blurted out. "Just a bit strong for my taste."

The bartender spat. "I ain't dishing out the next one til you finish that, boy."

Sighing, BBB went back to the Howler. Maybe if he took little sips this time…..

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: Dresden glanced at Cana as she leaves then orders another round of vodka and starts downing them. Dresden pulls his sleeve up as the bartender glances at Dresden's arm and notices the cuts on them. The bartender looks into Dresden's eyes and starts to ask a question, but Dresden looks into the man's eyes with a look of pure killing intent so the bartender stopped his question and grabbed more glasses of vodka. "Yep all is fine and dandy…."

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
Cana turned to Dresden hearing what he said
She laughed as she stretched and whistled

"Right Zypher we are off come on boy"

Ok

Cana and Zypher jumped over all nins spewed across the floor and they waved

"Seeyas"

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: Dresden glances at Cana with a glint of lust in his eye then he glances around the bar while drinking his drink and wonder when the next round of adventure would begin. "Yep just another friendly day in the neighborhood……" Dresden says to no one in particular.

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
Cana jumped up on a barstool beside dresden and flashed a rin his way
Still on a high from fighting she smiled at the barkeep and said

"That cover it?"

He nodded nervously as Cana stretched and looked up

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: Dresden watched as the dust settled then turned back around and sheathed sabrial and went back to drinking his drink.

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
Cana swayed to and frow seemingly dancing in time to the attacks aimed at her
She grinned
yay this is fun wohoo time for this dance to up a gear
She started to deflect the attacks on her using their speed and momentum to her advantage she saw a few flashes before her eyes and grinned amking those around her grimince
looks like Dresden is having fun too
She turned as the smoke cleared and pouted
"It looks like the fun is over aww no fair"

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: Dresden sat back causally and watched it all unfold, he drew out sabrial just to make sure no one wished to mess with him, just as he finished drawing it a Kunai flew through the air aimed right at his head, but within half of an eye blink his sword was deflecting the kunai back at the thrower. "Yep this is going to be fun…" Dresden remarked as he watched cana fighting. He wondered if he should help, but decided against it, "You can handle yourself kid….." Dresden then glances at the bar keep and back at the carnage. "Yep…..im not paying for this either." Dresden said while flashing sabrial a bit.

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
Cana lent back as a kunai enbedded itsself in the wall right where her head was un phased she threw one back it hit its mark and she tossed skips drink down to her

"here skip"

Another kunai hit the bar as the barkeep came out seening the possible carnage and the even larger bill coming his way
"OI"
he turned to Cana
"u stop this lot from causing further damage and I'll call it even"
Cana looked bewildered at him
"u mean it!?!?"
"Yes!!"
"no going back now"
"no going back!!!
"You are absolutly sure?"
"YES JUST GET RID OF THEM ALREADY!!!!!!
Cana tore off the cantina jacket jumped over the bar and yelled
"YOU'RE THE BOSS!!!!"

Cana tore into the cloud of ninja

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
"Gomen, I must've fallen asleep for a bit…" Skip shrugged off her fatigue and looked with dismay at Dresden who had just rang the bell.
"This sucks…I'm not getting paid for this crap! Plus, now I have to enroll in a new village and whatnot…looping's looming as well. Cana, I think I need something stronger-" Her foot went out to trip the nin sidling too close for comfort, a hand just too close to his weapon. Stamping on his throat she waited emotionlessly until the struggling stopped and the last breaths left the figure.
Cana looked to her and the body, a little shocked at Skip's out of character brutality.
"Can I have that drink now?"

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: Dresden glances up for a second at her and hits the bell not knowing what will happen he then spins around and waits, "Maybe now the fun will begin."

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
"Yeah I wonder"

Cana looked at the door willing it to open for a litle action but no luck

"I'm half tempted to ring the bell again but I dont have enough to pay for the last time let alone what would happen if I did"

Cana sighs

"If only I could call in the bounty money bout it doesnt work that way Its money for my head and where is the fun in that"

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: Dresden glances sidelong at her and her little burst of anger then goes back to staring at the bar wondering if others would ever come in. "Not much activity here today…..for the past few days to be exact……Where is everyone?" Dresden says to cana while still staring at the bar in deep thought.

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
"Ok well then if you are sure"

Cana jumps back behind the bar as the bar keep cums out and hands her a sheet

"Gah u gotta b kiddin another 30 day work here ……Skip stop the sniggering right now"

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: Dresden scoots away then continues to drink his drink, "Im fine"

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
Cana jumps ova the bar and sits beside Dresden
"Woah there whats the matter…. dont break your own stuff"
Cana puts her arms around Dresden and looks him in the eye
"Are you absolutly sure you're not drunk"

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: Dresden puts the device on the table and breaks it, "Nothing now….." gets another bloody marry and drinks it then waits.

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
"Oh really whatcha playin"

Cana intrest peaked walks back up to dresden leanin in to here the music

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: Dresden finishes the Bloody Mary then sets the glass down and music starts playing apparently from no where, "Its me." Dresden says to cana as he sees her glance around. Dresden points to his hand at the device playing the music, "Its a good song….." Dresden puts the device up and goes back to staring at the bar.

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
Cana walks back up the length of the bar and says

"I heard that and yeah there isnt but I'm stuck here"

She walks back to the other end to serve other punters

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: Dresden continues to sit there and just stare at the bar counter, "Not much to do here" Dresden says to apparently no one.

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
Cana looks at him skeptically
"Yeah yeah u keep telling your self that"
Dresden sways on his chair
"Zypher watch him"
"YES MAM"
Zypher saluts
"Ok Skip you wanted a top up..you too Mark …cumin right up"
Cana says as she continues down the length of the bar

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: Dresden knocks the drink out of her hand then catches it just inches before it hit the ground. "Im not as drunk as you think I am." Dresden closes his eye's and walks in a straight line and back without looking, "It takes more than 3 bottles of vodka to get me drunk….." Dresden starts to fall over sideways, but is caught and set in a chair by Cana, "This still doesn't mean I am drunk….."

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
Cana prys the bottle of vodka from Dresden' hands and keeps him arms length away with her foot and hands him the bloody mary and says

"Enough for you- drink this and sober up"

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: Dresden rubs his face and grabs a bottle of vodka and starts drinking. "That hurt………"

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
"HUH?"

Cana pulls a discusted face and serves Dresden a right hook and A bloody Mary

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: Dresden glances up and says, "Mind making yourself decent?" as he gets up.

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
Zypher Runs up to Dresden and rubs him to pet him

"Funny he not usually so friendly I guess you are special"

Zypher barks and growls as he grabs Dresden's wrist and pulls him out of the way of and incoming axe arc
the offending nin then tries to haul his axe out of the stool which Dresden vacated and sences a glare he looks up to Cana with Crimson slitted eyes glowing baring her canines

"I knight thee Good Night"

She clobers the nin and lets Zypher feed on his body

"huh? I'm all pumped up I guess it must be a full moon….u ok"

She leant ova the bar to look a Dresden

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: Dresden glances around for any one looking, "Yeah sadly it cant get much better than this since the walls have eye's and ears……" Dresden throws a bone to the dogs.

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
Cana's eyes widened

huh well I guess he is drunk after all thatr is a lot of vodka he backed

She looked at her bottle

then again so have I…. Well thats Wolf constitution for ya a couple more and I'll be tipsy" well I dont know it depends on the bar keep's mood

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: The vodka seems to start taking affect……"Yeah yeah yeah…i get it….so what time you get done here?" dresden says as he sets the vodka glass down a bit to hard shattering the glass.

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
"Aww come on and spoil the pups fun"

Cana rolled her eyes at Dresden

I wonder when he'd start

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: Glances towards cana's direction and accidentally stares at her assets, then turns away quickly hoping to go unnoticed. "Oh well tell him to leave and join a different village." Dresden says as he laughs nervously.

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
Cana calls over her sholder

"He is"

(Same Ip therefore concidered alt see sparring page)

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: "I thought Kanzaki was your brother?" dresden says as he sets his drink down again.

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
"I could but i'm not oone to give up on something one I start and Kanzaki is in Lone Wolf So there would be no point in going there"

Cana took some more orders for food and drink and went back to serving but staying in ear shot of Dresden so they could continue to talk

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: Dresden sips some more and wonders how stupid they must look chatting it up in a bar where fighting and such should be going on, but Dresden prefers it like this. "Yeah you'll live or you can just give up and go back to Lone Wolf or what ever it is you wish."

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
"Sweet I hafta wait to invage a village to keep down our upkeep its redicusly high"

(messenger is being a bugger wait a sec for me would ya plz)

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: Dresden sighs as he takes another sip of his drink, "Agh the jonin exams what a blast…..I planned on doing them tomorrow but sadly that plan is gone out the window since I have yet to get all the stuff together and I still require the crazy love triangle, ive got one of them down 2 to go. I gues I will use the 21 day bonus and the 1 week bonus tomorrow and hope I get everything I need together for the next go around."

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
"Pay off of my debt here & Make a page for Nightmare and try to improve the place that pritty much takes most of my time so I havent thought of anything else"

She makes up some table orders and sends them off with some bar staff

"What about you I mean after the joinin exam… scuse me ….OI CUT THAT OUT I HAAV ENOUGH TO PAY FOR AS IT IS "

Zypher and shadow freeze thinking it was them she was talking to

"I warned you 2"

Zypher and Shadow trembled since thy had already stopped

"BLEED CRIMSON TSUME"

Everyones line of vision turned crmson and their nostrils were filled with the sickining thick stench of blood
tHUNK the 2 nin who were wreaking the bar corner suddenly slumped to their knees and their skin started to turn a purple colour.
Zypher and Shadow let out a breath they didnt know they were holding and went back to play fighting

"Sory where were we"

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: Dresden takes some more then says, "Apparently I have a bit more knowledge than my current Kage, but he will not give up his command too me even if it is the best bet." Dresden glances around the cantina again then back down at his drink then back up into cana's eyes. "So…..what are your plans? For just about everything."

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
"Oh really find that hard to believe…. oh "

Cana looks at Dresden's glass and to her bottle oops

Cana scurries over to the bottle bank and grabs another bottle of vodka

"Care to join me"

She says while putting the new bottle beside Dresden and taking another swig of her one

"huhuhuhu that hits the spot"

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: Dresden laughs lightly at her, "Oh it is ok I have no problem. I just need to achieve my Jonin back then I will come help for a bit, I feel I have out lived my welcome in tardis." sets his glass down and shakes it around idly.

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
Cana shakes her head and waves her hands infront of her

"No I didnt mean for you to join my village ….I meand you can if you want……I meant as you were a co kage and such ….then again you are in such a superior village why would you want to …..I mean youare season 2 and I ………"

Cana hung her head down

" I should just leave the spade where it is huh?"

item.title: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: Dresden glances at Cana then at his Tardis head-band. "I…I do not yet know if I can or not. I am in need of a good village with nearly every upgrade….and Tardis has just that…….I may come and help you once I achieve Jonin, but until then I will stay here. I will help you as soon as I can." Dresden takes another swig and sets his drink down.
